feedback: Excellent skill alignment with job requirements, particularly in Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Transformer-based technologies.
Relevant experience developing AI-based solutions and leading projects involving complex healthcare and compliance applications.
Candidate has a strong academic background with MBA and B.Tech degrees aligning to the job requirements.
The resume could benefit from certifications in generative AI or machine learning to further strengthen alignment.
Language and Communication are exceptional with well-documented experience descriptions and summary.
Overall presentation is professional and clean, but could use more section-wise uniformity.
